data.name: SerializableObjectLayerClientCanLoadCollectionObjects
data.value: Indicates if an object layer can call the LoadCollectionObjects method to load collection properties.

data.name: XPBaseCollectionEnableObjectChangedNotificationsWhileEditing

data.value: This member supports the internal infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

data.name: XPObjectStubIsIntermediate
data.value: This member supports the internal infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

data.name: XPObjectStubIsNew
data.value: This member supports the internal infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

data.name: XPObjectStubKey
data.value: This member supports the internal infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

data.name: XPObjectStubOptimisticLockFieldInDataLayer
data.value: This member supports the internal infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

data.name: XPObjectTypeAssemblyName
data.value: This member supports the internal infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

data.name: XPObjectTypeFields
data.value: Gets an object that contains field identifiers for Simplified Criteria Syntax.

data.name: XPObjectTypeTypeName
data.value: This member supports the internal infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

data.name: XpoDataSourceCriteria
data.value: Gets or sets the string representation of criteria used to filter persistent objects to be retrieved by the data source control.

data.name: XpoDataSourceCriteriaParameters
data.value: Provides access to the collection of parameter values that are used to build the data source control's filter criteria.

data.name: XpoDataSourceDefaultSorting
data.value: Specifies how data source contents are sorted by default, when sort order is not specified by the bound control.

data.name: XpoDataSourceServerMode
data.value: Gets or sets whether server mode is enabled for the data-aware control bound to the current data source control.

data.name: XpoDataSourceTypeName
data.value: Gets or sets the type name of persistent objects to be retrieved by the data source control.

data.name: XpoDefaultActiveConnectionString
data.value: Gets the connection string which is used by the currently active connection.

data.name: XpoDefaultConnectionString
data.value: Gets or sets the string which is used to open a database, by default.

data.name: XpoDefaultDataLayer
data.value: Gets or sets the default data access layer which is used by Session objects by default, to access a data store.

data.name: XpoDefaultDefaultCaseSensitive
data.value: Specifies the default setting of the Session.CaseSensitive and XPDataView.CaseSensitive properties.

data.name: XpoDefaultDictionary
data.value: Gets or sets metadata on the persistent objects in a data store.

data.name: XpoDefaultIdentityMapBehavior
data.value: Gets or sets the Identity Map behavior.

data.name: XpoDefaultObjectLayer
data.value: Specifies the default object access layer which is used by Session objects by default, to retrieve and update object data in a data store.

data.name: XpoDefaultOptimisticLockingReadBehavior
data.value: Gets or sets a value which specifies how XPO behaves by default when reloading changed objects (objects with different versions).

data.name: XpoDefaultSession
data.value: Gets or sets the default session.

data.name: XpoDefaultUseFastAccessors
data.value: Gets or sets whether XPO uses its internal mechanism to create new instances of persistent classes, and to set and retrieve object property values.

data.name: XPPageSelectorCollection
data.value: Gets or sets the collection of persistent objects that the page selector is bound to.

data.name: XPPageSelectorPageSize
data.value: Gets or sets the maximum number of persistent objects that can be contained in a single page.

data.name: XPQueryBaseDictionary
data.value: Gets or sets the XPDictionary class descendant's instance which provides metadata on persistent objects in a data store.

data.name: XPQueryBaseSession
data.value: Gets or sets the session that is used to retrieve persistent objects in queries.

data.name: XPServerCollectionSourceAllowEdit
data.value: Gets or sets whether data editing is allowed.

data.name: XPServerCollectionSourceAllowNew
data.value: Gets or sets whether new items can be added to a collection by a bound control.

data.name: XPServerCollectionSourceAllowRemove
data.value: Gets or sets whether items can be removed from a collection by a bound control.

data.name: XPServerCollectionSourceDefaultSorting
data.value: Specifies how data source contents are sorted by default, when sort order is not specified by the bound control.

data.name: XPServerCollectionSourceDeleteObjectOnRemove
data.value: Gets or sets whether the persistent object is deleted from the data store when it is removed from the collection.

data.name: XPServerCollectionSourceDisplayableProperties
data.value: Gets or sets properties that are available for binding in a bound data-aware control at design time.

data.name: XPServerCollectionSourceFixedFilterCriteria
data.value: Gets or sets the criteria used to filter objects on the data store side. These criteria are never affected by the data-aware control that is bound to the current XPServerCollectionSource object.

data.name: XPServerCollectionSourceObjectClassInfo
data.value: Gets a XPClassInfo object that describes the target data table in the data store.

data.name: XPServerCollectionSourceSession
data.value: Gets or sets the Session used by the current XPServerCollectionSource object.

data.name: XPServerCollectionSourceTrackChanges
data.value: Gets or sets whether the XPServerCollectionSource tracks item changes.

data.name: XPTypeInfoAttributes
data.value: Gets the attributes for this type.

data.name: XPTypeInfoIsPersistent
data.value: Gets whether a class or member of this type is persistent.

data.name: XPTypeInfoIsVisibleInDesignTime
data.value: Gets whether a property or class is visible at design time.

data.name: XPViewCaseSensitive
data.value: Gets or sets whether string comparisons evaluated by the XPView on the client are case-sensitive.

data.name: XPViewCriteria
data.value: Gets or sets the criteria associated with the view.

data.name: XPViewGroupCriteria
data.value: Gets or sets the grouping criteria which is associated with the view.

data.name: XPViewObjectClassInfo
data.value: Gets the metadata information for the persistent objects retrieved by the view.

data.name: XPViewProperties
data.value: Gets a collection of ViewProperty objects that represent view columns.

data.name: XPViewSelectDeleted
data.value: Specifies whether objects marked as deleted are retrieved by the XPView.

data.name: XPViewSession
data.value: Gets or sets the session which is used to load and save persistent objects.

data.name: XPViewSkipReturnedRecords
data.value: Gets or sets the number of records to exclude when populating the view.

data.name: XPViewSorting
data.value: Provides access to the collection whose elements identify the sorted columns within the view.

data.name: XPViewTopReturnedRecords
data.value: Gets or sets the maximum number of records retrieved by the view.

data.name: XPWeakReferenceIsAlive
data.value: Gets whether the object referenced by this instance has been garbage collected.

data.name: XPWeakReferenceTarget
data.value: Gets or sets the object referenced by the current XPWeakReference instance.
